mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_detail_info ( goods_id, goods_name, goods_unit, price, coupon_price, begin_date, end_date, goods_type, order_no, buy_num, pay_price, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{goodsId}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsUnit}, #{price}, #{couponPrice}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{goodsType}, #{orderNo}, #{buyNum}, #{payPrice}, #{createTime}, #{createTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT goods_id goodsId, goods_name goodsName, goods_unit goodsUnit, price price, coupon_price couponPrice, begin_date beginDate, end_date endDate, goods_type goodsType, order_no orderNo, buy_num buyNum, pay_price payPrice FROM order_detail_info WHERE order_no = #{orderNo}
